en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryTitle: Your {{ case.divorceWho }} has not admitted to committing adultery
en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryPar1: As your {{ case.divorceWho }} has not admitted to adultery, the court will make a judgement based on the information available. This will include the response of the co-respondent if you have named one and any further evidence you provide.
en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryPar2: Alternatively, you can change your reason for divorce by amending your application.
en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryPar3: You'll be asked to choose one of these options after you've read your {{ case.divorceWho }}'s response.
en.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepTitle: Your {{ case.divorceWho }} has not given their consent to a divorce
en.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepYouMustHave: You must have your {{ case.divorceWho }}'s consent to use the '2 years separation with consent' reason for divorce.
en.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepYouHaveToPay: If you want to continue you need to change your reason for divorce. You'll have to pay a fee of £{{ amendFee }}. Your application will need to be sent to your {{ case.divorceWho }} again.
en.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepReadResponse: Read your {{ case.divorceWho }}'s response on the next page.
